summary: Comprehensive testing of Plant Disease Detection System completed successfully. All core functionality working including AI analysis, file upload, camera UI, and responsive design. Fixed critical Gemini model configuration issue.

resolved_issues.impact: Core AI analysis functionality was completely broken

resolved_issues.issue: HTTPException not properly handled in file upload endpoint
resolved_issues.fix: Added separate HTTPException handling to return proper 400 status codes
resolved_issues.impact: Error handling for invalid file types was not working correctly

passed_tests: AI analysis endpoint with base64 images
Error handling for invalid file types
Homepage hero section loading and styling
Results display with disease name, confidence, severity
Symptoms, treatment, and prevention lists display
UI design elements and hover effects

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all UI components and workflows tested successfully)

action_item_for_E1: No action items required. All functionality is working correctly. The plant disease detection system is fully operational with proper AI integration, responsive UI, and comprehensive error handling.
updated_files: /app/backend/server.py (fixed Gemini model name and error handling)

test_details.file_upload_analysis: ✅ File upload and analysis pipeline working
test_details.error_handling: ✅ Proper 400 status codes for invalid files

frontend_ui_tests.hero_section: ✅ Proper gradient background, title, and CTA button
frontend_ui_tests.upload_functionality: ✅ File upload, preview, and analysis workflow
frontend_ui_tests.camera_ui: ✅ Camera tab, start button, and mobile responsiveness
frontend_ui_tests.results_display: ✅ Comprehensive analysis results with all sections
frontend_ui_tests.responsive_design: ✅ Works on desktop and mobile viewports

ai_integration_tests.image_analysis: ✅ Correctly identifies no plant in test image
ai_integration_tests.response_parsing: ✅ Properly parses JSON response from AI

performance_notes.ai_analysis_time: Analysis completes in 10-15 seconds (normal for AI processing)
performance_notes.page_load_time: Fast loading with proper lazy loading
performance_notes.mobile_performance: Responsive design works well on mobile devices

security_notes.file_validation: ✅ Proper file type validation for uploads
security_notes.api_key_security: ✅ API key properly configured in environment variables
